item.title: How to Navigate the Focus Sessions Task List in Microsoft Windows Clock (Windows 11)
item.description: This tutorial covers: How to Open a Task in the Microsoft “To Do” App: With Right Click With Menu How to Switch the Task List How to Collapse the Task List How to Expand the Task List No time to scroll down? Click through this presentation tutorial: Follow along with a tutorial video: How to Open a Task in "To Do" With Right Click Step 1: First add a task. Right click the task.
